newsitem.title: JAPAN: Dell computer prices down about 30 pct in Japan.
newsitem.headline: Dell computer prices down about 30 pct in Japan.

text.p: Dell Computer KK, a wholly owned subsidiary of Dell Computer Corp, said on Wednesday it will lower prices of all desktop and notebook-type computers in Japan by up to about 30 percent, to accelerate sales and increase market share in the corporate sector.
The company said the biggest cut of 30.2 percent will be applied to its most prestigious model, OptiPlex GXpro, which is loaded with a Pentium Pro processor.
Dell expects to lead the market in the transition from Pentium to Pentium Pro processors by initiating competitive prices even against models with the Pentium processors.
